item.title: fetch and Axios
item.description: Which should be used? Axios or fetch() Difference between Fetch and Axios for making http requests General One the fundamental tasks of any web application is to communicate with servers through the http protocol. This can be easily achieved using Fetch or Axios. fetch() The Fetch API provides a fetch() method defined on the window object. It also provides a JavaScript interface for accessing and manipulating parts of the Http pipeline(requests and responses).
